articles.content: In November 2020, Grey’s Anatomy the longest-running primetime medical drama in TV history will begin season 17 on ABC. After 363 episodes, the series still ranks as the number one drama among 18 to … [+4386 chars]

articles.title: Iggy Pop says Nine Inch Nails’ music “feels like hearing the truth” as he inducts band into Rock and Roll Hall of Fame - NME
articles.description: "Listening to Nine Inch Nails feels like hearing the truth," Iggy Pop said as he inducted the band into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
articles.content:
Iggy Pop likened listening to Nine Inch Nails to “hearing the truth” as he inducted the band into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame last night (November 7).
Trent Reznor’s band joined the famed list al… [+2845 chars]
